doc:
Johnny Downs https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Johnny_Downs 0 John Morey Downs (October 10, 1913 – June 6, 1994) was an American actor, singer, and dancer. He began his career as a child actor, most notably playing Johnny in the Our Gang short series from 1923 to 1926. He remained active in films, television, and theatre up through the early 1960s. John_Morey_Downs ( October_10_,_1913 – June_6_,_1994 ) was an_American_actor , singer , and dancer . He began his_career as a_child_actor , most notably_playing Johnny in the_Our_Gang_short_series from 1923 to 1926 . He remained active in films , television , and theatre up through the_early_1960s .
